attributes.action: Home Office hacking the computer of Tribunal users.
attributes.additional_details:
Stop the Home Office destroying emails and letters and hacking into the computers of those who are seeking justice via an Employment Tribunal.

The government needs to investigate why emails, texts and other documents still disappear from the Home Office just as they did in the Brodie Clarke case and take action to ensure that the culprit(s) are drummed out of the service and the victim suitably compensated for the five years of oppression.
